column4: do you have a good download manager, such as DownThemAll for Firefox, or are you just using torrents? DownThemAll has helped me out a lot at times when I had poor connectivity.
tough living, man. is that dial-up? and ramorek, in Carbon County, he doesn't really have another option!

ugh, that's the good ol' US of A for ya. FWIW, Congress is trying to change the definition of broadband to be much more restrictive, meaning that far fewer locations in the US would be classified as having broadband, which should get some attention on the problem. right now anything above 200kbps qualifies as "broadband"!
yes, and they are trying to do it with broad band over powerline, which sucks, it whipes out all the hf ham radio operators, including me.
